prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that has a vibrant mushroom cap and large claws.
Show me a tiny Pokemon that resembles a crab with a pink shell and white eyes.
Design a Pokemon with a forest habitat that has distinct insect-like features.
Imagine a Pokemon that uses its mushroom as a camouflage against predators.
Give me a Pokemon that evolves from a small bug into a larger, more powerful creature.
Generate a cute Pokemon with a quirky personality and a love for damp environments.
Make a Pokemon that has a unique combination of bug and grass traits.
